Package org.jcatapult.servlet

Interface Summary
Workflow This interface defines a unit of work that should be performed prior to the JCatapultFilter passing control down the J2EE filter chain.
WorkflowChain This interface defines how Workflow instances pass control to the next Workflow or back to the JCatapultFilter.
WorkflowResolver This class is used by the JCatapultFilter to allow additional processing to occur during an HTTP request rather than defining HTTP filters in web.xml.
 

Class Summary
DefaultWorkflowChain This class is the default chain that first iterates over all the Workflow instances that were resolved in the JCatapultFilter using the WorkflowResolver implementation.
DefaultWorkflowResolver This is the default workflow resolver and it currently returns an a list that contains an instance of StaticResourceWorkflow and JPAWorkflow in that order.
JCatapultFilter This is the main Servlet filter for the JCatapult framework.
JCatapultServletContextListener This class bootstraps the entire JCatapult system.
ServletObjectsHolder This class is a static storage location for the servlet context.
ServletTools Toolkit for Servlet related tasks User: jhumphrey Date: Apr 23, 2008
StaticResourceWorkflow This class handles static resources via the JCatapult workflow chain.
SubWorkflowChain This class is a sub-workflow chain that can be used to chain multiple workflows under a single workflow.
